title: Union Of Enemies - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Childhood Friends   Doctors   Enemies Become Lovers   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Popular Love Interests   Tomboyish Female Lead
author: Xiao Yao Hong Chen   逍遥红尘
description: Zhen Lang and Gu Jing have been childhood enemies for over twenty years and pretend best friends in front of their parents. Zhen Lang and Gu Jing’s source of happiness is defaming their enemy (each other) at every opportunity, dreading the day their parents’ match-making dream comes true.>
